title: Paychex Expects Profit to Increase by About 9%
text:
By Allison Prang

Paychex Inc. (PAYX) increased its profit guidance for the fiscal year.

The company said it expects earnings to increase by about 9%. It had been expecting profit to rise by about 8%.

The company is expecting adjusted earnings to rise by about 9%. It previously said it expected them to rise between 8% and 9%.

Paychex also said its expects management solutions revenue to increase by about 5%, which is up from its previous estimate of about 4%.

The company is expecting PEO and insurance services revenue to rise by about 30%. It had been expecting that revenue stream to increase between 30% and 35%.

Write to Allison Prang at allison.prang@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 02, 2019 09:04 ET (13:04 GMT)
